Ice House follows the story of two friends, Grant and Wayne, on one nightâ€™s excursion to a fish house on a frozen Minnesota lake for an evening of camaraderie. What seems to be a harmless outing between two friends slowly evolves into a murderous plot between two men, both with hidden secrets and mysterious agendas.

2020
Stars: Michael Alexander, Greg Berman, Abby Ciardelli
